Your instructors include key authors, maintainers, and contributors of the SEMinR package [@ray2021seminr]. 
Click on the names to find out more.

#### Instructors

[André Calero Valdez](/andre.html) is a Professor for Human-Computer Interaction and Usable Safety Engineering at the University of Lübeck. 

[Lilian Kojan](/lilian.html) is a PhD candidate at the University of Lübeck.

[Nicholas Danks](/nicholas.html) is a Professor of Business Analytics at Trinity Business School at Trinity College Dublin.

[Soumya Ray](/soumya.html) is a Distinguished Professor of Service Science at the National Tsing Hua University.
